reviews.text: Muy buena el lugar impecable el servicio el mejor mi orden no tardo ni un minuto y con mucha amabilidad

This is hands down the worst Popeyes. This is the *third* time they‚Äôve messed up my order, and once again, I got spoiled coleslaw. This is actually the second time I‚Äôve brought home sour, spoiled coleslaw from this location. When I called‚Ä¶

This store has the worst customer service. I ordered 15 cheesecakes and they didn‚Äôt put any cheesecakes; instead they offered apple pies. Also, they kept me waiting for an hour and 11 minutes. I ordered at 1:16 pm, I received the order at 2:27 pm. Worst customer service ever.

This location was NOT customer friendly. I ordered a promotion they offered to, buy one get one free and they did not honor their own promotion. I only received one sandwich. I called them to let them know, however they refused to provide the other sandwich. I will NEVER order from them again or any other Popeye for that matter again. Treat customers better!!!
This Bronx Popeyes is hands down the best one I've been to in the 27 states I've traveled,  several in which I've eaten Popeyes!! Big ups Bronx!!

They were busy for making food but very very slowly. Manager Popy was taking with someone with earphone and making food very slowly. I used to work in Popeyes so I could even think how she became general manager with her poor performance of making food and customer service. ! I was waiting around 9/10 min . And observing their service which is very poor . Manager Popy should have take her business seriously. Or she can learn her lesson again. No shame !
I was not restroom or wash my kids hands not serve nice chicken not all done. Everything was dirty not happy at all. I spent over $60.

Nice service.

Everytime you come to this location for anything it‚Äôs long wait times, not sure they understand what ‚Äúfast food is‚Äù I came in today for a 4pc chicken combo the cashier was very rude and rushed my order after I told her 2 breast 2 thighs. She rung it up as a wing, a breast and a leg are you kidding me!? lol she had an issue when I said that‚Äôs not what I asked for after checking my receipt. I said: everytime you guys give legs and winds and they‚Äôre very small pieces that doesn‚Äôt seem right for $17.41 hopefully they work on their customer experience in this neighborhood I‚Äôve seen so many businesses come and go

Tried getting a big box for the price offered $6 any 2 signature piece 2 sides and biscuit, but couldn't because the employee wanted to over charge me $1 extra for wanting a breast and wing. The cash register machine even rung out 6.53 for the order (breast and wing) but she still wanted to charge me $6.53+ $1 extra separately, It made absolutely no sense and I saw right through that scheme, ya can keep that chicken nd make no $ from me.
Was busy. Didn't wait long for my food.

September 26 2024. The manager named ‚ÄúPOPY‚Äù i believe that‚Äôs what her tag said/picture shows . The cashier was nice, no issues. I paid for my food. Once I purchased my food , the cashier then tells me I have to wait 10-15 minutes because they just ran out of chicken. I said okay that‚Äôs fine. I went to sit down for literally about 3 minutes, got up to ask for a courtesy cup of water. The manger told me ‚Äú No , but you can buy a bottle of water‚Äù. I couldn‚Äôt believe she said that. I said ‚Äúi don‚Äôt want a bottle of water, you aren‚Äôt supposed to deny me a courtesy cup of water, it‚Äôs a small cup of TAP water‚Ä¶ come on Popeyes this was so wrong. She was so rude and mean. I explained about 3 times how can you deny me a courtesy cup of water when 1) I LITERALLY AM A PAYING CUSTOMER. 2) I WAS TOLD AFTER PURCHASING THAT I HAVE TO  WAIT 10-15 MINUTES FOR CHICKEN. How could you deny a paying customer a courtesy cup of water. she still didn‚Äôt relinquish over something so small . That‚Äôs when I asked for a FULL REFUND she said to the cashier ‚Äú give it to her ‚Äú.

* I LITERALLY NEVER EVER WRITE REVIEWS OR TAKE PHOTOS BUT I WONT STOP COMPLAINING ABOUT THIS UNTIL SOMEONE RESPONDS TO ME!
Great Customer Service

I spent $15 on 6 wings and a big box. Which was very little food. First they gave me five chicken wings, rather than 6. I had to tell them. They never put napkins in the bag for this greasy food. I saw a bathroom in the restaurant. They keep it locked with a double doors, so no one can use it. Yet the workers son used it without a problem, or some kid they knew.  The workers refused to let me son use. Most likely they did not want to clean it, so it is restricted.

I will never give this place my business again: this is no way to treat reoccurring  customers who buy food to help them keep their jobs and to provide for their families. I would rather give the business to any other place around this area. Never again.
Ok..

I will never buy from this Popeyes again! The manager didn‚Äôt want to change my drink and the drink was so sweet I got frozen lemonade!? I asked if he can change for mango ice tea and he said no! I bought a chicken wing combo and he put very little French fries in a bag and I was splitting the food with a friend. When we got home she told me he barely gave you fries and also no biscuit! So I called he said come back I will give you more fries then I get there and after he gives me the fries I asked where‚Äôs the biscuits?? He said it doesn‚Äôt come with the combo and I spent 32$ on 12 pieces of chicken with fries and no biscuit! Very expensive and the manager was cheap and no Napkins! Also they didn‚Äôt offer any sauce I had to ask ! So ridiculous!
Took Took long after I ordered only after I said I want my money back did the wings appeared from the back

Do not order French fries in this location they gave me such a small order of fries for 2 orders. I called them on why such a small amount of French fries and they said that's the amount they provide.. all other locations are generous. Also the chicken was dry. The location was better run before now my family won't be ordering here again.
I ordered a three piece chicken with Mac and cheese and frozen lemonade,the chicken was so dry and a thigh was only breading,the Mac and cheese was delicious and the frozen lemonade was good.

They charge a lot of money and the orders are always wrong.
Every time I ask  the cashier why  charges me more money for the same food, she gets upset, she is not friendly and  is not the best Popeye, I do not recommend it. The
Hispanic men and the Indian lady  has attitude. Avoid being robbed every time they charge you.

I have had a great experience every time I have ordered instore, online or via food service app. The food has been fresh every single time. The employees are extremely friendly and knowledgeable regarding upgrades or cost cutting. Also the‚Ä¶

Biggest feedback for the manager: please take care of your customers, dine-in, takeout, or mobile order. This happened to me multiple times:

3/5 times i order mobile order, i'd expect it to be ready within 5 minutes of me stepping into the store, because mobile order is ordered in advanced. 3/5 times, i had to wait upwards to TWENTY (20) MINUTES to receive my mobile order. I stand by the "mobile order pick-up" sign, and try to get their attention, but every time, they ignore me (no eye contact and walk away quickly) or only serve the dine-in orders, and then not making eye contact and walking away quickly.

Please please please give the mobile order people your attention and don't deliberately ignore us or force us to walk over to the cash register to get attention. What is the point of the "mobile order pick-up" sign if it doesn't make a difference where you stand to get attention? Just get rid of it then. If we're not saying anything, then please ask. You never ask, ever. I know you see people entering your store, and if you don't check-in with them, how will you know why they're in the store? This shows a lack of concern and care for your customers, so please pay attention to people coming into your store, especially if they're standing and waiting.
The quality of food (Crispy Chicken and Tenders) is excellent compared to other local places like Texas Chicken & Burger.  It is also fairer in price.‚Ä¶

This is my first time I am writing review for any restaurant. I want to tell everyone to be careful when you are paying for your food. Sometimes they charged extra and refused to except their faults.Before you leave the store, please recheck your receipt.

The woman manager doesn‚Äôt do her job at all. Every time a customer had a problem she would just walk away and not say anything to resolve the issue. And then the employees do the same thing and another employee comes to handle it. Why is‚Ä¶

The food was good but two many delivery guys just sitting there at the tables on their phones waiting on orders taking up seats not even eating beside that u get your food fast depending on how busy it is

I wonder why store always look empty? Everyone shouldn't have to buy big meals just to get chicken. I have seen some walk out. Something wrong here ...,.

The Spanish male employee is so rude and arrogant. Picks and chooses who and when he wants to serve and just will start talking and playing around no matter how busy it gets. This location needs new employees period.
